example.content: root> show configuration security address-book | display set set security address-book mybook address ADD1 3.3.3.3/32 set security address-book book2 address ADD5 description ADD5descr set security address-book book2 address ADD5 wildcard-address 2.2.2.2/255.255.255.255 set security address-book book2 address-set addSet1 address ADD5 set security address-book test address add2 range-address 1.1.1.1 to 2.2.2.2 set security address-book test attach zone junos-host set security address-book test2 address ADD10 description "test de description" set security address-book test2 address ADD10 dns-name add.fqdn.com ipv4-only set security address-book book1 address VMR3 dns-name vmr.ubiqube.com set security address-book book1 address ADD22 22.22.22.0/24 set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet1 description descrAddSet1 set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet1 address VMR3 set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet1 address-set addressSet2 set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet1 address-set addressSet3 set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet2 description "address group 2" set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet2 address VMR3 set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet2 address ADD22 set security address-book book1 address-set addressSet3 description addSet3descr
